DOC.brief_summary: This study test safety ALKS 5461 healthy adult .
DOC.criteria: Be good physical health Body mass index 1830 kg/m2 Agree use approve method birth control duration study Additional criterion may apply Currently pregnant breastfeed History current infection Hepatitis B Virus , Hepatitis C Virus Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) Current history clinically significant medical psychiatric condition Current abuse dependence alcohol illicit drug Have use nicotine within 90 day Have use St. John 's Wort consume grapefruit , grapefruit juice , juice contain grapefruit within 30 day Have use prescription overthecounter medication , include natural health product ( exception prescription birth control hormonal replacement , acetaminophen , ibuprofen , multivitamin ) within 14 day Have use opioids 30 day prior screen anticipate need opioid medication point study Have history intolerance hypersensitivity buprenorphine opioid antagonist ( eg , naltrexone , naloxone ) Additional criterion may apply
